attributes.action: hold a referendum on the introduction of a system of proportional representation before the next election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British peoples growing dissatisfaction with politics in this country was reflected in the very poor turnout for the 2005 general election. Now is the time to ask the people if our current voting system can still be held up as their method of choice for determining a true democracy.
